column4: HI all , I have a nviea Ge force 6200 with turbo cache video card, I only seem to be able to go up to 1024*768 res. and 54hz refresh, could get much higher in windows, is there another driver, have installed the glx driver.
edit the xorg.conf file to manualy add the higher rez you need,    gksu gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf
for each depths,   add the resolution you want to add and know you can ( whaever it is  like  1280 x 1024)   use the same syntax
